data.title: 5 Bollywood celebrities who have recently opened restaurants
data.meta_description: Bollywood celebrities are increasingly venturing into the culinary world, launching new restaurants that reflect their unique styles and passions. Sunny Leone's Chica Loca brings vibrant Mexican flavours, while Shilpa Shetty's Bastian elevates fine dining with health-conscious options. Meanwhile, Gauri Khan's Torii offers chic settings and diverse menus to cater to discerning patrons. With their star power and creative vision, these eateries promise innovative cuisine and memorable dining experiences. Here’s a list of some of the recent restaurant launches by Bollywood celebrities that you must know about. (Images courtesy: official Instagram pages)
data.text:
Bollywood celebrities are increasingly venturing into the culinary world, launching new restaurants that reflect their unique styles and passions. Sunny Leone's Chica Loca brings vibrant Mexican flavours, while Shilpa Shetty's Bastian elevates fine dining with health-conscious options. Meanwhile, Gauri Khan's Torii offers chic settings and diverse menus to cater to discerning patrons. With their star power and creative vision, these eateries promise innovative cuisine and memorable dining experiences. Here’s a list of some of the recent restaurant launches by Bollywood celebrities that you must know about. (Images courtesy: official Instagram pages)

Another new entrant in the restaurant world is Rakul Preet Singh, who has launched a completely millet-based dine-in restaurant in Hyderabad, which is co-owned by Curefoods. As a proponent of healthy living, Rakul's restaurant offers a refreshing take on traditional Indian cuisine, showcasing the versatility and nutritional benefits of millets. Her restaurant coincides with the Indian government too, which is promoting the usage of millets as they are hailed as the next superfood. The restaurant has a refreshing vibe and offers a simple, delicious and healthy food for the soul.

Making her debut in the culinary world, Bollywood actor Sunny Leone recently opened her new restaurant Chica Loca in Noida, India, breaking away from the Mumbai-centric trend. Inspired by her travels, Chica Loca boasts an eclectic menu of Asian delights and signature cocktails, each infused with Sunny's personal touch. Partnering with Singing Bowls Hospitality, she plans expansion to Hyderabad, Goa, and Punjab. Leone's distinctive glamour is evident in Chica Loca's decor, showcasing purple hues and her portraits. Each cocktail at Chica Loca comes with a personal anecdote, enhancing the dining experience.

Gauri Khan is a name that coincides with interior decorations and this is what reflects in her new restaurant Torii, which is a dynamic Asian eatery that seamlessly blends diverse Asian influences into its global culinary repertoire. Drawing inspiration from Japanese culture, Torii offers an immersive dining experience amidst stylish interiors and sumptuous cuisine. Gauri's attention to detail shines through, making Torii a feast for the senses. Khan's vision transforms the space into a captivating haven, where design elements harmonize to set the stage for memorable meals. Boasting a diverse menu and a vibrant bar program, Torii epitomises Khan's knack for creating spaces that leave a lasting impression, inviting patrons to embark on a culinary journey unlike any other.

Badmaash, a plush new restaurant co-owned by actress and entrepreneur Mouni Roy is renowned for its innovative Indian cuisine and lively atmosphere. With a blend of vibrant flavours and impeccable hospitality, Badmaash promises an unforgettable dining experience curated by Roy's vision and culinary expertise. With Mouni's creative flair and culinary expertise, Badmaash promises an unforgettable gastronomic journey, blending traditional flavours with contemporary flair.

In the heart of Mumbai's bustling F&B scene, the 48th floor of Kohinoor Square in Dadar is always bustling with Shilpa Shetty’s Bastian restaurant. Situated amidst breathtaking city views, Bastian offers a blend of health-conscious and refined cuisine, curated by Shilpa herself. The space is divided into 'Forest' and fine dining sections, exuding earthy tones and dreamy vibes. And the best thing is that the menu is curated by Shilpa Shetty, with her classic favourites and enticing new dishes, catering to both health-conscious diners and aficionados of refined cuisine.
